title: ANI spreading fake news with communal angle
selftext:
https://twitter.com/zoo\_bear/status/1682080638684508160?s=20 

ANI has recently spread fake news on twitter. Today 3 rapists were arrested who were responsible for raping kuki women. Also, today Manipur police arrested a person named abdul khan , who is member of PREPAK ( separatist organization). These two are completely different case.  ANI mixed the two news and said that abdul khan is the person responsible for rape. Later ANI deleted this tweet. But bjp IT cell spread the fake news on twitter with help of their trolls.

Why is no action taken against such channels? It was fake news that causes rape of two girls and now such organizations dont even think what will happen after spreading such news. What do they want?

Also, today Manipur police arrested a person named abdul khan , who is member of PREPAK ( separatist organization). These two are completely different case. ANI mixed the two news and said that abdul khan is the person responsible for rape. Later ANI deleted this tweet. But bjp IT cell spread the fake news on twitter with help of their trolls. Why is no action taken against such channels? It was fake news that causes rape of two girls and now such organizations dont even think what will happen after spreading such news. What do they want?
